title: Spacious floor plan features 3 bed, 1 bath, and spacious living room,~
posting_body: Spacious floor plan features 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and spacious living room, hardwood floor, spacious ready to use basement.
Newer appliances , new heater and water tank.
Eat-in kitchen with new fixtures Convenient location.
Newly remodeled, Outdoor freshly painted, Huge backyard for kids to play or have barbeque Very mature neighborhood.
Easy access to shopping and bus line.
First full months rent: $510 and security deposit: $500 due at move-in.
Text or Call to schedule your tour TODAY:-
TENANT PAYS ALL UTILITIES INCLUDING WATER AND SEWER .
PET SECURITY DEPOSIT MIGHT BE REQUIRED.
